title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.11 - Assurance, facilities to be accessible for handicapped persons
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2302.11 - Assurance, facilities to be accessible for handicapped persons

State Regulations

The New York State Education Department assures that in the
case of any project for the repair, remodeling, or construction of facilities, the facilities will be accessible to and usable by handicapped
persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2302.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
